pr_title: Performance: +3.4% avoid expensive unescape when not needed

timeline.message:
Optimied implementation to extract the resourceId.

new implementation avoid expensive StringUtils.Split

timeline.bodyText: Any specific reason why are we not using primitive types here -> char ?
timeline.author: kushagraThapar

replies.bodyText: Because using Character class here will result in auto-boxing later in your code below.
replies.author: kushagraThapar

timeline.bodyText: please also consider a unit test for unescapeJavaAndTrim() implementation when escaping or not escaping case.
timeline.author: moderakh
